channel.title: CVE Feed for SUSE -- SUSE Openstack Cloud 8
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SUSE -- SUSE Openstack Cloud 8

item.title: CVE-2019-3683|2024-09-17T02:53:23.354Z -- suse -- suse%20openstack%20cloud%208
item.description: The keystone-json-assignment package in SUSE Openstack Cloud 8 before commit d7888c75505465490250c00cc0ef4bb1af662f9f every user listed in the /etc/keystone/user-project-map.json was assigned full "member" role access to every project. This allowed these users to access, modify, create and delete arbitrary resources, contrary to expectations.
